column4: hello all when make upgrade show this massage (E: Sub-process /usr/bin/dpkg returned an error code (1))
does sudo apt-get update work ok?
ok, now try sudo apt-get upgrade
sudo apt-get clean && sudo apt-get upgrade
can you please pastebin the output of "sudo apt-get upgrade"
in a pastebin please, its gonna be a lot
ok now sudo apt-get install <app name>
can you install your app now?
ok can you run ls where you are now and pastebin the output
sudo rm -f system-tools-backends; sudo apt-get --purge remove system-tools-backends; sudo apt-get -f install; sudo apt-get update
